typeDescription.name: org.ohnlp.medtagger.type.ConceptMention
typeDescription.description: Concept mention stands for concepts detected by the NLP system

featureDescription.name: detectionMethod
featureDescription.description: There are multiple approaches to detect concept mentions including: dictionary lookup, machine learning approaches trained using different training corpus (i2b2 2010 Concept Mention, or SHARE 2013 concept mention corpus).

featureDescription.name: normTarget
featureDescription.description: This corresponds to the preferred names of the corresponding concepts. Currently, it is chosen as the most popular synonyms appearing in the clinical corpora.

featureDescription.name: Certainty
featureDescription.description: This refers to the certainty context. The definition is consistent with Context: see http://orbit.nlm.nih.gov/resource/context

featureDescription.name: semGroup
featureDescription.description: Semantic groups of the corresponding concepts. Adapted from SemGroup defined in the UMLS. See: http://semanticnetwork.nlm.nih.gov/SemGroups/

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: This refers to the status context. The definition is consist with Context: see http://orbit.nlm.nih.gov/resource/context

featureDescription.name: sentence
featureDescription.description: The sentence containing the concept mention

featureDescription.name: experiencer
featureDescription.description: This refers to the status context. The definition is consist with Context: see http://orbit.nlm.nih.gov/resource/context

typeDescription.name: org.ohnlp.medtagger.type.DictContext
typeDescription.description: Stores the original entry of the dictionary

featureDescription.name: entry
featureDescription.description: This contains the original dictionary entry

featureDescription.name: position
featureDescription.description: Locate before or after or a termination of a context or pseudo of the concept mention (POST, PRE, BOTH, TERMIN, PSEUDO)

featureDescription.name: contextType
featureDescription.description: the type of the context words (neg, hist, hypo, poss, exp, hypoexp)
